articles.author: Marlene Lenthang
articles.title: Video shows dramatic rescue of baby, 9 others from rushing floodwaters in Washington - NBC News
articles.description: Dramatic video shows the moment U.S. Coast Guard helicopter crew members rescue 10 people, including a baby, from murky floodwaters that have inundated parts of Washington state following record rainfall in the Pacific Northwest.

articles.author: Adela Suliman
articles.title: Henry Macklowe divorce art sells for $676 million at Sotheby's auction - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Macklowe Collection, which included artwork by Mark Rothko, Jackson Pollock and Cy Twombly, is the most valuable auction ever held in the 277-year history of Sotheby’s.
